title: Sustainable ESG Investing: Turning Promises into Performance
description: Steve Strongin, a senior advisor at Goldman Sachs, discusses the future of ESG investing, based on a new Goldman Sachs Research report, Sustainable ESG Investing: Turning Promises into Performance.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
